title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 555.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 555.1 - Policy

State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any owner or operator to abandon
any well, wells or lease without having plugged and abandoned such well or
wells and effected surface restoration in the manner prescribed
herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
555.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
